entry.title: Tuesday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon and ending later this afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers or drizzle late this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 this morning. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 15 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 3. POP 40%
